subject: Simsonn after-sales service
description_text: Hello, I noticed that you gave us a one-star review. We have replied to you. Please check your spam folder.

conversations.body_text:
I have the plus X pedals and I have tried everything including ferrite cores. They are still not working. I bought evething as a package and it just such a hassle to have hem not work. I think I just need to return them 

>
Hi hanna krause,     I am an engineer. Could you please describe the specific issue with your pedals? You can take photos or provide a video, and we will assist you in resolving it quickly.
